title: Gadna Tel Aviv Yehuda F.C.
text:
Gadna Tel Aviv Yehuda Football Club (), is a <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club in <a href="Tel%20Aviv">Tel Aviv</a>, <a href="Israel">Israel</a>. The club is one of the most successful youth academies in the history of Israel, competing in youth competitions at all age levels.
History.
Gadna Yehuda was created in 1947 as a feeder team in the hope of transferring young Israeli players to the top clubs in Israel.
In 2008, after more than 61 years as only working in the youth leagues, the club created a senior side. In the <a href="2010%E2%80%9311%20Liga%20Gimel">2010–11 season</a> the senior side of the club got promoted to <a href="Liga%20Bet">Liga Bet</a> after they won <a href="Liga%20Gimel">Liga Gimel</a> Tel Aviv Division. In the <a href="2012%E2%80%9313%20Liga%20Bet">2012–13 season</a> they finished 14th in Liga Bet South A Division, and got relegated after losing the relegation play-offs against <a href="Hapoel%20Kiryat%20Ono%20F.C.">Hapoel Kiryat Ono</a> and Maccabi Bnei Jaljulia. the senior club did not enter Liga Gimel at the <a href="2013%E2%80%9314%20Liga%20Gimel">2013–14 season</a>.
